A web devigner and full-stack FRED

My name is Timothy. I currently work at an incredible company called Firespring. I'm a Front-End Developer (FRED) and designer from the great state of Nebraska.

I build great websites. But more importantly, I ship. Even if I haven't quite polished enough (hint).

This blog and all words (typos and all) are free and open source. Use them.
